name: Level Thumbnails
description: Adds thumbnails to levels in search.

disableCache.name: Disable Cache
disableCache.description:
Disables the <cj>cache</c>.
Makes updating thumbnails not require a game <cy>restart</c>.

alternativeSpacer.name: Use Alternative Separator
alternativeSpacer.description: Uses an alternative <cj>separator sprite</c> (streakb_01_001 instead of square02_001). This removes the <cy>rounded corners</c> with square02, but may cause issues with <cb>texture packs</c>.

thumbnailButton.name: Enable Thumbnail Button
thumbnailButton.description: Adds a <cj>button</c> in the <cy>Level Page</c> that lets you view the thumbnail of the level you are currently on.
